item.title: Upcoming Events
item.description:
SKEGNESS COACH TRIP `24

Sunday 8th September 2024

If you missed our popular Skegness coach trip in May, don’t worry, we are arranging another visit on Sunday 8th September 2024!

Departs: Leicester General Hospital @08:00 (Free Parking)

Returns: Leaving Skegness @17:00

Tickets are available on a first-come, first-served basis at the bargain price of just Â£15 per person. Renal patients will get refunded on the day.

item.title: Previous Events
item.description:
Social contact is important for mental health and wellbeing, we hold events throughout the year for patients and their family members why not come along and join us.

We try to arrange a variety of events to suit different tastes and interests.

Do you look good in Purple? Join us!
